quote: He pulled something out of his pocket and tried to stick it in her arm. A needle. He'd offered her hope, but then he was trying to hurt her. Poison. She pushed him away. ""That wasn't nice.
quote_letters: HE PULLED SOMETHING OUT OF HIS POCKET AND TRIED TO STICK IT IN HER ARM A NEEDLE HED OFFERED HER HOPE BUT THEN HE WAS TRYING TO HURT HER POISON SHE PUSHED HIM AWAY THAT WASNT NICE
